thread.title: Durant scores 23, Thunder roll past Nuggets, 111-98
thread.title_full: Durant scores 23, Thunder roll past Nuggets, 111-98

author: CLIFF BRUNT, AP Sports Writer
title: Durant scores 23, Thunder roll past Nuggets, 111-98
text: Close Image 1 of 9 Oklahoma City Thunder forward Kevin Durant (35) gestures in the first quarter of a preseason NBA basketball game against the Denver Nuggets in Oklahoma City, Sunday, Oct. 18, 2015. Oklahoma City Thunder forward Kevin Durant (35) gestures in the first quarter of a preseason NBA basketball game against the Denver Nuggets in Oklahoma City, Sunday, Oct. 18, 2015. Denver Nuggets forward Danilo Gallinari (8) tries to knock the ball away from Oklahoma City Thunder forward Kevin Durant (35) in the first quarter of an NBA preseason basketball game in Oklahoma City, ... more Photo: Sue Ogrocki, AP Image 5 of 9 Denver Nuggets forward Joffrey Lauvergne (77) dunks in front of Oklahoma City Thunder forward Serge Ibaka, left, and center Steven Adams, center, in the first quarter of an NBA basketball game in Oklahoma City, Sunday, Oct. 18, 2015. Denver Nuggets forward Joffrey Lauvergne (77) dunks in front of Oklahoma City Thunder forward Serge Ibaka, left, and center Steven Adams, center, in the first quarter of an NBA basketball game in Oklahoma ... more Photo: Sue Ogrocki, AP Image 6 of 9 Denver Nuggets guard Erick Green (11) shoots between Oklahoma City Thunder forward Serge Ibaka (9) and Thunder guard Russell Westbrook (0) in the second quarter of an NBA preseason basketball game in Oklahoma City, Sunday, Oct. 18, 2015. Denver Nuggets guard Erick Green (11) shoots between Oklahoma City Thunder forward Serge Ibaka (9) and Thunder guard Russell Westbrook (0) in the second quarter of an NBA preseason basketball game in ... more Photo: Sue Ogrocki, AP Image 7 of 9 Oklahoma City Thunder center Enes Kanter (11) shoots in front of Denver Nuggets center Nikola Jokic (15) in the second quarter of an NBA preseason basketball game in Oklahoma City, Sunday, Oct. 18, 2015. Oklahoma City Thunder center Enes Kanter (11) shoots in front of Denver Nuggets center Nikola Jokic (15) in the second quarter of an NBA preseason basketball game in Oklahoma City, Sunday, Oct. 18, 2015. Photo: Sue Ogrocki, AP Image 8 of 9 Denver Nuggets forward Danilo Gallinari (8) is fouled by Oklahoma City Thunder forward Serge Ibaka (9) as he shoots in the second quarter of an NBA preseason basketball game in Oklahoma City, Sunday, Oct. 18, 2015. Denver Nuggets forward Danilo Gallinari (8) is fouled by Oklahoma City Thunder forward Serge Ibaka (9) as he shoots in the second quarter of an NBA preseason basketball game in Oklahoma City, Sunday, Oct. ... more Photo: Sue Ogrocki, AP Durant scores 23, Thunder roll past Nuggets, 111-98 1 / 9 Back to Gallery OKLAHOMA CITY (AP) â€” Kevin Durant scored 23 points to help the Oklahoma City Thunder beat the Denver Nuggets 111-98 on Sunday night. Durant played 32 minutes, the most action he's had since coming back from a broken foot that cost him most of last season. He shot 9 of 14 and had six rebounds. Rookie Emmanuel Mudiay scored 22 points for the Nuggets. NUGGETS: Danilo Gallinari and Erick Green each scored 16 points. THUNDER: G Dion Waiters scored 17 points. ... C Steven Adams was poked in the eye in the third quarter, left the game and did not return. ... C Enes Kanter had 18 points and 11 rebounds before fouling out. STAR WATCH: Thunder G Russell Westbrook had 17 points, 12 assists and five rebounds. MIDSEASON FORM: Thunder F Serge Ibaka scored 18 points on 7-for-8 shooting. UP NEXT: Denver visits Utah on Thursday; Oklahoma City visits Utah on Tuesday. Southeast Texas sports news
